Comment.Language: The service is concluded by chanting the canon for Hosanna Sunday:

Text.Language: Rasi ounof Ciwn ]baki: [ierouot ouoh yel/l: h/ppe gar Peouro efn/ou: eftal/out ejen ouc/j: euhwc qajwf n~je nia~lwoui~: je w~canna qen n/et[oci: vai pe Pouro m~Pic~ra/l.
Rejoice and be glad, O city of Zion. Exult and rejoice for, behold, your King comes riding on a colt. Before Him the children praise saying, â€œHosanna in the Highest! This is the King of Israel!â€?

Etafi~ n~je Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc: e]baki n~te Il#/#m#: ejwk e~bol n~nigrav/: n~te nicwtp m~p~rov/t/c: nia~lwoui~ fai n~hanbai: je w~canna qen n/et[oci: vai pe Pouro m~Pic~ra/l.

When our Lord Jesus Christ came to the city of Jerusalem to fulfill of the scriptures of the elect prophets, then the children carried palm (leaves) saying, â€œHosanna in the Highest! This is the King of Israel!â€?

Ahanoun vwrs n~nouh~bwc: hijen pimwit m~pefm~yo: hina n~tefmosi e~h~r/i ejwou: n~je I/#c# piNazwreoc: ere han kouji w~s e~bol: je w~canna qen n/et[oci: vai pe Pouro m~Pic~ra/l.
Some spread their vestments on the road before Him that Jesus the Nazarene may walk on them. And the little ones proclaim and say, â€œHosanna in the Highest! This is the King of Israel!â€?

Tote ecjwk e~bol m~voou: n~je ]nis] m~p~rov/tia: je e~bolqen rwou n~hankouji nia~lwoui~: n~yok akcebte pic~mou: euw~s e~bol n~je nia~lwoui~: je w~canna qen n/et[oci: vai pe Pouro m~Pic~ra/l.
Then was fulfilled the great prophecy today, â€œOut of the mouth of babes, You have prepared praise.â€? And the children proclaim and say, â€œHosanna in the Highest! This is the King of Israel!â€?

Tote afjoc n~je Dauid: qen p~jwm n~te ni'almoc: je f~c~marwout n~je v/eyn/ou: qen v~ran m~P[oic V]: ere nia~lwoui~ hwc e~rof: je w~canna qen n/et[oci: vai pe Pouro m~Pic~ra/l.
Thence said David in the Book of the Psalms, â€œBlessed is He who comes in the name of the Lord God.â€? And the children praise Him saying, â€œHosanna in the Highest! This is the King of Israel!â€?

Etafi~ n~je I/#c# e~qoun e~Il#/#m#: ]baki t/rc s~yorter: eybe nim/s etkw] e~rof: ere nia~lwoui~ w~s e~bol: je w~canna qen n/et[oci: vai pe Pouro m~Pic~ra/l.
When Jesus entered into Jerusalem, the whole city trembled because of the multitudes surrounding Him. And the children proclaim and say, â€œHosanna in the Highest! This is the King of Israel!â€?

Then the lawless Jews were filled with great jealousy and said unto our Lord Jesus saying, â€œLet the little children stop saying, â€˜Hosanna in the Highest! This is the King of Israel!â€™â€?

Peje I/#c# n~niIoudai je eswp ausan ,arwou: n~je nikouji nia~lwoui: sauw~s e~bol n~je niw~ni: ouoh n~touhwc e~roi: je w~canna qen n/et[oci: vai pe Pouro m~Pic~ra/l.
Then said Jesus to the Jews, â€œIf these little children hold their peace, the stones would cry out and praise Me saying, â€˜Hosanna in the Highest! This is the King of Israel!â€™â€?
